ygData.subject: Re: Thoughts and Plots and Stories . . . oh my!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, Just shedding a little light :) I hope you guys don t mind that I dropped every body down into a hole, but it is the only thing that  makes sense right

Subject: Re: Thoughts and Plots and Stories . . . oh my!

Hello,

Just shedding a little light :)

I hope you guys don't mind that I dropped every body down into a hole,
but it is the only thing that  makes sense right now. We were all
fighting basically in a hallway, and that hallway was getting a might
full! Sending missiles into such a confined space was bound to have
interesting results, I thought this would be fun, plus it did get a
chance to shake everyone up at the same time.

Everyone that was in the fight, except those that were with Legacy
should be down in the large chamber below.

I did this also to create persepctive. Keep in mind that the bots are
actually in an extremely dangerous position. Nearly all the Predacons
and Decepticons are here, while the bots are spread out. You have
Rodimus and Tuscon who are both Prime class, but you also have Hydras,
Jhiaxus and Cyclonus who are each one nearly the same strength.
(Legacy is also nearly in that class as well) However as the cons have
others in the room: Deepstryke, Phobia, Nightrazor, Scourge, the bots
only have Nightshift. also the cons also had the internal base
defences firing as well, which made this whole battle interesting.

Hopefully this shake up will give the bots a chance to regroup and
decide what they are going to do while every one is recovering. If you
want to stay and fight that is cool, however with the odds, I would
seriously recommend get out of there as quick as you can. If this was
a battle where we were using stats and rolling dice . . . well thing's
would probrably not end well :)

Anyways, game on!

Preston
